plot outline: Kaadakalam story situation starts with the life of kunjapoo a boy aged 10 years, he loves to go to forest along with his father and to know to the way his father and the entire tribe is surviving in the forest. His father Murugan tells him about the story of an elephant known as Chilli komban who usually scares the tribal people. kunjapoo some how wants to see Chilli Komban. Murugans wish is to send kunjapoo out side the forest and teach him after him after his 4th standard but kunjapoo loves to stay in forest he don't want to go outside.story of kaadakalam starts in this way and finally gives a meaning that every one has a space of their on where they have their own roles ,which will be empty if that person is not there.
title: Kaadakalam
plot: _Kaadakalam_ (qv) movie speaks about the relation between a tribal boy and his father and the way he teaches his son to live in the forest and love the forest.

_Kaadakalam_ (qv) story situation starts with the life of kunjapoo a boy aged 10 years, he loves to go to forest along with his father and to know to the way his father and the entire tribe is surviving in the forest. His father Murugan tells him about the story of an elephant known as Chilli komban who usually scares the tribal people. kunjapoo some how wants to see Chilli Komban. Murugans wish is to send kunjapoo out side the forest and teach him after him after his 4th standard but kunjapoo loves to stay in forest he don't want to go outside.story of kaadakalam starts in this way and finally gives a meaning that every one has a space of their on where they have their own roles ,which will be empty if that person is not there.::Baburaj Asariya
